7c47769aa22176de20a10639e758e01bba2e2a11.summary: Remove Quick Filter Files and fix FS search hotkey
7c47769aa22176de20a10639e758e01bba2e2a11.body:
The new Quick Filter Files behaviour since 8b47e26 had not been implemented,
so this implements it and makes it an editor hotkey instead of a menu entry.
Fixes #7582.

(cherry picked from commit c4d6e54e93431e94888c5594386bcd0aa22528ee)

93a83c81f04cffc149e5048bd43f0a627e1cf700.summary: Windows: Workaround missing includes in MinGW-w64 < 4
93a83c81f04cffc149e5048bd43f0a627e1cf700.body:
The MinGW-w64 version we have on our Travis build environment (Ubuntu 12.04,
mingw-w64 2.0.1, gcc 4.6) is old and has some missing includes in the
dependencies of the `tcpmib.h` header [0] [1] [2].
Those were not triggered before 6323779596dea0db7f58afef7d3d3d5588ef20cb
probably due to conflicting WINVER definitions which prevented triggering the code
specific to >= 0x0600 (Vista). We ensure it won't be triggered by defining the
_WIN32_WINNT macro to Windows XP compatibility.
(cherry picked from commit b24fe6879a2d26b530c1198ba7abb8cf2719f06c)

b24fe6879a2d26b530c1198ba7abb8cf2719f06c.summary: Windows: Workaround missing includes in MinGW-w64 < 4
b24fe6879a2d26b530c1198ba7abb8cf2719f06c.body:
The MinGW-w64 version we have on our Travis build environment (Ubuntu 12.04,
mingw-w64 2.0.1, gcc 4.6) is old and has some missing includes in the
dependencies of the `tcpmib.h` header [0] [1] [2].
Those were not triggered before 6323779596dea0db7f58afef7d3d3d5588ef20cb
probably due to conflicting WINVER definitions which prevented triggering the code
specific to >= 0x0600 (Vista). We ensure it won't be triggered by defining the
_WIN32_WINNT macro to Windows XP compatibility.

d66740175eef6f67f2edb364533fa71eaad5ceb7.body:
Passed as a compiler define to be sure it is always define before windows.h
is loaded. This means that Godot officially requires Vista API or later, it will
not work on Windows XP or earlier.

Also fix a bogus check for Windows 7 API.

(cherry picked from commit 6323779596dea0db7f58afef7d3d3d5588ef20cb)

6323779596dea0db7f58afef7d3d3d5588ef20cb.body:
Passed as a compiler define to be sure it is always define before windows.h
is loaded. This means that Godot officially requires Vista API or later, it will
not work on Windows XP or earlier.

Also fix a bogus check for Windows 7 API.

d2240404e39e50b19281dd31c0ef8b0120da11ee.summary: Fix for the huge audio latency of the SamplePlayer (>200 ms)
d2240404e39e50b19281dd31c0ef8b0120da11ee.body:
- fixes PulseAudio, ALSA and RtAudio driver
- cleans up the driver files for better readability (mostly whitespace-related stuff)
- makes ALSA and Pulseaudio actually use the global setting "audio/mix_rate" for the sample rate instead of a
fixed value (RtAudio did this already)

(cherry picked from commit da6b6c2dd790a1a6f1702efe1b075b09ec76fb48)

da6b6c2dd790a1a6f1702efe1b075b09ec76fb48.summary: Fix for the huge audio latency of the SamplePlayer (>200 ms)

- fixes PulseAudio, ALSA and RtAudio driver
- cleans up the driver files for better readability (mostly whitespace-related stuff)
- makes ALSA and Pulseaudio actually use the global setting "audio/mix_rate" for the sample rate instead of a
fixed value (RtAudio did this already)

d8223ffa75f7028bb104001e7195233f335556f2.body:
That year should bring the long-awaited OpenGL ES 3.0 compatible renderer
with state-of-the-art rendering techniques tuned to work as low as middle
end handheld devices - without compromising with the possibilities given
for higher end desktop games of course. Great times ahead for the Godot
community and the gamers that will play our games!

(cherry picked from commit c7bc44d5ad9aae4902280012f7654e2318cd910e)

with state-of-the-art rendering techniques tuned to work as low as middle
end handheld devices - without compromising with the possibilities given
for higher end desktop games of course. Great times ahead for the Godot
community and the gamers that will play our games!

the unchanged absolute path otherwise.

0701e7c2d822691f2b716ecda5b009c4f5cf271f.summary: PopupMenu upgrade: Hide on item selection (#7306)
0701e7c2d822691f2b716ecda5b009c4f5cf271f.body:
* Added the option to set hide on item selection. Usable in GDScript and from within the source code when you want to specify popup menus you don't want to close immediately when selecting an item

* Renamed getter from get_ to is_, fixed parent/child behavior, renamed bool variable to match most code and added ADD_PROPERTYNO to save some memory

(cherry picked from commit da950cd0f27a4f1f2a2d596efae846d1c22442a2)

0aebdb346a08be085f0e4b69098675cbf1145110.body:
fixes #7346

Path from the current scene isn't added too the argumens anymore by default and needs to be added throug the custom arguments, with $scene. Matches the behaviour of the executable without any arguments.
Custom Arguments are read from editor/main_run_args

5bfd0bbe5e6b35aa212510a8961a5ebe2fb59842.summary: TextureRegionEditor: Fix mouse wheel scroll speed.
5bfd0bbe5e6b35aa212510a8961a5ebe2fb59842.body:
Any given mouse wheel input will generate two InputEvents in godot.
The zoom methods here acted on both ones, effectively giving a step value of 4 instead of 2.
Fixes #7236

(cherry picked from commit c2040324beea92dcf7b44be5f4827257bd872d00)

c2040324beea92dcf7b44be5f4827257bd872d00.summary: TextureRegionEditor: Fix mouse wheel scroll speed.

Any given mouse wheel input will generate two InputEvents in godot.
The zoom methods here acted on both ones, effectively giving a step value of 4 instead of 2.
Fixes #7236

00fdcf3cd000d0b2cf0bb1a95733ce905ca972f4.summary: IP_Address now handle IPv4 and IPv6 transparently
00fdcf3cd000d0b2cf0bb1a95733ce905ca972f4.body:
IP_Address changes:
- Converts to and from String transparently while handling IPv4 as IPv6
mapped (::ffff:[IP]) address internally.
- Completely remove AddrType enum.
- Setting/Getting of ip array is now only possible through dedicated functions
(ie. set_ipv4, get_ipv4, set_ipv6, get_ipv6)
- Add function to know if the address is a valid IPv4 (for IP implementation and enet)

(cherry picked from commit 1aff508dd9713abf0db0d0436fa7f7c4788c5a4a)

1aff508dd9713abf0db0d0436fa7f7c4788c5a4a.summary: IP_Address now handle IPv4 and IPv6 transparently
1aff508dd9713abf0db0d0436fa7f7c4788c5a4a.body:
IP_Address changes:
- Converts to and from String transparently while handling IPv4 as IPv6
mapped (::ffff:[IP]) address internally.
- Completely remove AddrType enum.
- Setting/Getting of ip array is now only possible through dedicated functions
(ie. set_ipv4, get_ipv4, set_ipv6, get_ipv6)
- Add function to know if the address is a valid IPv4 (for IP implementation and enet)

a46a643f90b4a5e93f94e9223e58a7bf83dc4e2a.summary: Use an instance variable for ip_type in raw sockets
a46a643f90b4a5e93f94e9223e58a7bf83dc4e2a.body:
PacketPeerUDP/StreamPeerTCP/TCP_Server now uses an instance variable
to store the selected ip_type (IPv4/IPv6/ANY, where ANY = dual stack).
All calls to resolve addresses, sending/receving data, connecting/listening
will use that socket type.

(cherry picked from commit 95bdd977686005d3d813eb09aca625384f1774c1)

All calls to resolve addresses, sending/receving data, connecting/listening
will use that socket type.

a3582fa3cb11c785ecf61dd2b04656473864b27e.summary: png: Allow building shared freetype with bundled libpng
a3582fa3cb11c785ecf61dd2b04656473864b27e.body:
This was the behaviour when building Godot 2.1, which allows to build against
Ubuntu 12.04 and its freetype that links old libpng12, while still bundling
libpng16.

(cherry picked from commit 4965ddfaa1536fb179d4b156d1ecb8a72a3c565f)

4965ddfaa1536fb179d4b156d1ecb8a72a3c565f.summary: png: Allow building shared freetype with bundled libpng
4965ddfaa1536fb179d4b156d1ecb8a72a3c565f.body:
This was the behaviour when building Godot 2.1, which allows to build against
Ubuntu 12.04 and its freetype that links old libpng12, while still bundling
libpng16.

326978dcce2068f373d7c60540b3d7c5fa402303.summary: Revert "libpng: Fix erroneously linking against libpng12 on old distros"
326978dcce2068f373d7c60540b3d7c5fa402303.body:
This reverts commits 5fa1bb331ad9be31dbfc752c7d19ccf7caeb8fa
and ec4be71fade1ee5c6171e323d09197f3bf528499.

Looks like Debian/Ubuntu are not even shipping libpng16 nowadays in their
stable releases, we'll have to go back to statically linking our own
libpng16 to wait for them to stop being 5 years behind everybody.

(cherry picked from commit c32766a482595256bc48155587a47f27848ac8ea)

c32766a482595256bc48155587a47f27848ac8ea.summary: Revert "libpng: Fix erroneously linking against libpng12 on old distros"

This reverts commits 5fa1bb331ad9be31dbfc752c7d19ccf7caeb8fa
and ec4be71fade1ee5c6171e323d09197f3bf528499.

Looks like Debian/Ubuntu are not even shipping libpng16 nowadays in their
stable releases, we'll have to go back to statically linking our own
libpng16 to wait for them to stop being 5 years behind everybody.
